verses.verse: He who <S%H6504>separates<s%> himself <S%H1245>seeks<s%> [his own] <S%H8378>desire,<s%> He <S%H1566>quarrels<s%> against <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H8454>sound<s%> <S%H8454>wisdom.<s%>
A <S%H3684>fool<s%> does not <S%H2654>delight<s%> in <S%H8394>understanding,<s%> But <S%H518>only<s%> in <S%H1540>revealing<s%> his own <S%H3820>mind.<s%>
When a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>man<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> <S%H937>contempt<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> And with <S%H7036>dishonor<s%> [comes] <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of a man's <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are <S%H6013>deep<s%> <S%H4325>waters;<s%> The <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is a <S%H5042>bubbling<s%> <S%H5158>brook.<s%>

To <S%H5375>show<s%> <S%H5375>partiality<s%> <S%H6440><s%> to the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is not <S%H2896>good,<s%> [Nor] to <S%H5186>thrust<s%> <S%H5186>aside<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
A fool's <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7379>strife,<s%> And his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H7121>calls<s%> for <S%H4112>blows.<s%>
A fool's <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is his <S%H4288>ruin,<s%> And his <S%H8193>lips<s%> are the <S%H4170>snare<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

The <S%H1697>words<s%> of a <S%H7279>whisperer<s%> are like <S%H3859>dainty<s%> <S%H3859>morsels,<s%> And they <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H2315>innermost<s%> <S%H2315>parts<s%> of the <S%H990>body.<s%>
He <S%H1571>also<s%> who is <S%H7503>slack<s%> in his <S%H4399>work<s%> Is <S%H251>brother<s%> to him who <S%H7843>destroys.<s%>
The <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is a <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4026>tower;<s%> The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H7323>runs<s%> into it and is <S%H7682>safe.<s%>
A <S%H6223>rich<s%> man's <S%H1952>wealth<s%> is his <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H7151>city,<s%> And like a <S%H7682>high<s%> <S%H2346>wall<s%> in his own <S%H4906>imagination.<s%>
<S%H6440>Before<s%> <S%H7667>destruction<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H1361>haughty,<s%> But <S%H6038>humility<s%> [goes] <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H9202>honor.<s%>
He who <S%H7725>gives<s%> an <S%H1697>answer<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> he <S%H8085>hears,<s%> It is <S%H200>folly<s%> and <S%H3639>shame<s%> to him.
The <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%> can <S%H3557>endure<s%> his <S%H4245>sickness,<s%> But a <S%H5218>broken<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H5375>bear<s%>?
The <S%H3820>mind<s%> of the <S%H995>prudent<s%> <S%H7069>acquires<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> And the <S%H241>ear<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
A man's <S%H4976>gift<s%> <S%H7337>makes<s%> <S%H7337>room<s%> for him, And <S%H5148>brings<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1419>men.<s%>
The <S%H7223>first<s%> to <S%H7379>plead<s%> his <S%H7379>case<s%> [seems] <S%H6662>just,<s%> [Until] <S%H7453>another<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> and <S%H2713>examines<s%> him.
The <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H7673>puts<s%> an <S%H7673>end<s%> to <S%H4066>contentions,<s%> And <S%H6504>decides<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H6099>mighty.<s%>

A <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H6586>offended<s%> [is harder to be won] <S%H4480>than<s%> a <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H7151>city,<s%> And <S%H4066>contentions<s%> are like the <S%H1280>bars<s%> of a <S%H759>castle.<s%>

With the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of a man's <S%H6310>mouth<s%> his <S%H990>stomach<s%> will be <S%H7646>satisfied;<s%> He will be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> [with] the <S%H8393>product<s%> of his <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
<S%H4194>Death<s%> and <S%H9132>life<s%> are in the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> And those who <S%H157>love<s%> it will <S%H398>eat<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>
He who <S%H4672>finds<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H4672>finds<s%> a <S%H9185>good<s%> <S%H9185>thing,<s%> And <S%H6329>obtains<s%> <S%H7522>favor<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
The <S%H7326>poor<s%> <S%H7326>man<s%> <S%H1696>utters<s%> <S%H8469>supplications,<s%> But the <S%H6223>rich<s%> <S%H6223>man<s%> <S%H6030>answers<s%> <S%H5794>roughly.<s%>

A <S%H376>man<s%> of [many] <S%H7453>friends<s%> [comes] to <S%H9570>ruin,<s%> But <S%H3426>there<s%> is a <S%H157>friend<s%> <S%H1695>who<s%> <S%H1695>sticks<s%> <S%H1692>closer<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> a <S%H251>brother.<s%>
